column4: I installed ubuntu using wubi and then tried to move the install using LVPM, but for some reason, ubuntu does not show up in the grub menu.  I get an UnknownOS which points to my Windows Bootloader and then the actual Windows Bootloader.  The ubuntu install is still associated with the windows bootloader.  any suggestions?
becuase wubi runs as a task under windows
LVPM is supposed to move Ubuntu to its own seperate partition
i've not had good luck with that - - but YMMV (your mileage may vary)
